JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Kokke søges til 4 og 5 stjernet hoteller i Holland
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We are looking for chefs to work in The Netherlands. 

Are you someone who works accurately and who likes to work creatively and innovatively? In our kitchen you work with the most modern equipment and a young, ambitious team who together with you take up the challenge to surprise our guests with culinary delights every day. We like to let you shine in our á la carte, brasserie and live cooking kitchen where we work with fresh products. 

The open kitchen is equipped with the latest technology and equipment.

 

What does your day look like?:

  • Participate in the implementation
  • Together with the Chef/Sous Chef you are responsible for stock management and orders
  • Being able to manage and man all departments of a kitchen
  • Supervising compliance with the regulations in the field of safety, working conditions and HACCP and other rules.

 

What do we expect from you?:

  • At least one year of demonstrable experience in an equivalent position, or at least 2 years as an independent working cook
  • Enthusiastic and motivated
  • Knowledge of HACCP
  • Hands on mentality
  • Flexible attitude
  • Speak English
  • Passion for the hospitality industry
  • Attention to detail
